review: I have multiple products like this, and very powerful internet.  This is terrible.  The premise is really good...but when a 7-year old Wii can load and play Amazon Prime Video without having to stall every 2-3 minutes and this can't...then it's not worth the money.  I've tried multiple apps...from Pandora to Netflix to Disney Jr and cannot play anything for more than a few minutes without it having to buffer.  Then, after doing this 2 or 3 times in a ten minute period, the stick just re-starts itself!  It's awful!
author: Danielle Logan
